_comment: PFIC QEF Tool - AIS Data Template
_instructions: Fill in values from your PFIC's Annual Information Statement (AIS)
All per-share amounts should be converted to USD
The AIS typically provides these values directly - look for:
- 'Ordinary Earnings per share per day' (in USD)
- 'Net Capital Gains per share per day' (in USD)
- 'Total Cash Distributions' per share for the year (in USD)
For underlying PFICs (funds held by your fund):
- Add each one to the underlying_pfics array
- These are also per share of the TOP-LEVEL fund you hold
NOTE: The number of days in the tax year (365 or 366) is automatically
calculated based on the tax_year - you don't need to specify it.
_note_distributions: Total cash distributions for the entire year, NOT per-day

underlying_pfics._comment: Add one entry for each underlying PFIC. Delete this example.
